Brilliant collection of songs. Excellent taste and a great place to find new tracks. Keep up the good work

This is an excellent upload fo anyone who wants incredible new music.  And one of the most organized sets I've ever dl'ed.  Nice to see such good taste and attention to detail!  Looking forward to more.  btw I seed out to at least 5x

I know this playlist is almost a year old, but I thought it was cool that Building Rome is on here.  I'm the female vocalist on that track.

Hi Criznittle! Thanks for all these awesome playlists. I don't suppose you have all of the album 'Wisely', do you? That song you put on here, "Cracked World View" is amazing, and I really want some more of that guy's music, but I can't find it anywhere. (Also, if you have "Wisely Life: Tokyo Doki-Doki" too, that would be awesome.)
